snippet: Each September, an old-timers’ battle brings together men who played in two amateur leagues in the Dominican Republic in the 1950s and ’60s: the Liga del Cine and the Liga Ozama.
abstract: Men who played in two amateur baseball leagues in the Dominican Republic in 1950s and ’60s gather each September since 1985 in an old-timers game.
lead_paragraph: Each September, an old-timers’ battle brings together men who played in two amateur leagues in the Dominican Republic in the 1950s and ’60s: the Liga del Cine and the Liga Ozama.

headline.seo: Alumni of Two Dominican Amateur Leagues Play Each September
